name: Cryodemento 2023
description:
This game is about you controlling a person who got kicked out of their house after their parents got sick of them. Survive the night for as long as you can with only your flimsy coat, PJs and a flashlight. IT follows you, it wants your sanity, run from IT, you want IT to stop. The snow wants your heat, the snow wants your health.

Controls:

E - Pick up items

Hold Shift- RUN

Credits:

Will C: Game Designer, General Programming, Title Music

Kaelin WH: Monster Programming

Gabriel M: Sprites, Sound Effects

Ben F: Level Generation, Programming, and Design
